question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding Nadir Shah?
1. Nadir Shah and Mohd. Shah Rangeela met at Karnal in c.1739 CE, but Mohd. Shah was defeated.
2. Nadir Shah also took away the famous Kohinoor Diamond.
3. Nadir Shah was an able general and administrator, but an inhumane butcher in the course of war.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Nadir Shah and Mohd. Shah Rangeela met at Karnal in c.1739 CE, but Mohd. Shah was defeated. Nadir Shah also took away the famous Kohinoor Diamond from India. Nadir Shah was also an able general and administrator, but an inhumane butcher in the course of war.
